title: Platform Engineering Training Heads to Offices in 2025
author: Todd R Weiss
description: PlatformEngineering.org is about to start taking their coursework (and certifications) on the road to teach platform engineering to IT administrators inside their own company offices.
cntitle: 平台工程培训将于2025年在办公室进行
cndescription: PlatformEngineering.org即将开始开展他们的课程（和认证）培训，前往公司内部为IT管理员讲解平台工程。
